Html:
I'm fiddling around with my prot warrior in Rawr. and for some reason it rates my helmet higher if I put a dodge/stamina stone in there, and I'm still not crit immune (538), and in the options in the attacker stats it says level 83. and when I list gems, it rates dodge/defence as the highest. and rate dodge/stamina as number 15 or so. I'm just confused.

 

Edit: the character is here http://dl.getdropbox.com/u/2022303/honeyblossom%20tank.xml
You probably want to use the Optimizer, with an Additional Requirement of 'Chance to be Crit <= 0'.
